snippet.title: Kitsune Tails - Official Nintendo Switch Announcement Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2021
snippet.description:
As revealed during Day 2 of Guerrilla Collective 2021, Kitsune Tails is coming to Nintendo Switch. Check out the latest trailer for a look at gameplay, an adorable costume, and more for the upcoming game inspired by Japanese mythology. Kitsune Tails is coming to Nintendo Switch, PS4, PS5, and PC. A Kickstarter for the game will be available in Q4 2021.

#GameTrailers #Gaming #SummerOfGaming
